titleStmt.title: A letter of advice and comfort to the English captives, who suffer slavery in foreign parts By Josiah Woodward, D.D. minister of Popler.
titleStmt.author: Woodward, Josiah, 1660-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for VVilliam Hawes, at the Rose in Ludgate-street,
